name: ALTERNATIVE FOR RURAL MOVEMENT
briefDescription: ARM is a Non Government Development Organisation working for the empowerment & sustainable development of deprived village people of North Orissa with emphasis on   backward rural Women, Children and Dalit communities. It has been striving steadfastly to establish an alternative and prosperous rural social order so that all people cutting across the barrier of caste, creed, economic condition and gender can have a decent living without any discrimination and inequality. Thanks to the Lord, by way of conducting multifarious activities ARM has already projected itself as the harbinger of grassroots liberty and empowerment of in Coastal North Orissa during the last two decades. ARM has been accredited for desirable norm by Credibility alliance
